alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 8:29PM CDT until May 20 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Texas... Guadalupe River at Victoria affecting Victoria County. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River at Victoria. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.8 feet, moderate flooding causes water to flow over Slayton Avenue and Memorial Drive, and starts flowing from the West Outfall toward Constitution and Craig Streets. Water is over Constitution and Craig Street and over areas west of Moody Street between Water and Constitution Streets. Water is also flowing over McCright and flowing into the golf course. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday, the stage was 28.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting at 28.9 feet this evening and will begin a slow fall Wednesday morning, dropping below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Guadalupe River Victoria 21.0 28.9 Tue 8 pm 28.1 24.9 20.9 17.5 12.7 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
